name: No(No)tes For My Test
description:
In this friendly platformer, you try to keep all your notes and get to class for your all-important test, but bullies will try to knock notes out of your backpack! Get to school with as many notes as possible!

Controls:  Move left and right: A and D, or left and right arrows. Jump: Spacebar. Throw Note: F. Pause: Escape Button.
